# VoteWise API

Restful Api for VoteWise

# To start server

1) From root of project, npm install
2) node server.js
3) You can the make HTTP request from http://localhost:8080/api
4) try a GET request to http://localhost:8080/api/user with headers x-access-token:eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..E8mMU7lnojlWG4UyGzkFTMA4lFvjQP2DQ5yaQl8fqAU

That long string after x-access-token is a generated JWT
